name: Midnight Scenes Ep.2: The Goodbye Note
name_original: Midnight Scenes Ep.2: The Goodbye Note
description:
"Taking this plane was a mistake. I trapped myself."

In tonight's episode of Midnight Scenes, we follow Dr. Richard P. Griffin
during the scariest journey of his life.

---

Turn off the lights and enter the mysterious world of Midnight Scenes, a serie of free,  spooky, short games by Octavi Navarro, creator of Pixels Huh and artist on games like Thimbleweed Park and Photographs.

Being a huge fan of Rod Serling's The Twilight Zone since he was a kid, Navarro's atmospheric black and white art is inspired on horror and mystery shows from the 60's.

Welcome to a dimension of horror.
Welcome to Midnight Scenes.
